Text: Five young men disappeared in Lagos de Moreno on August 11, 2023, during the local fair, and their families are still demanding answers from the authorities.
The crisis in Lagos de Moreno continues as 506 men and 83 women are reported missing, making it one of the hardest-hit areas in Jalisco.
A protest in Lagos de Moreno called for justice for Roberto Olmeda and his friends, who vanished over a year ago, with no clear updates from the Jalisco government.
The Jalisco Cartel is suspected to be behind the disappearance of five friends in Lagos de Moreno, a case that shocked the nation in 2023.
Families in Lagos de Moreno are frustrated after a year without progress in the search for five missing youths, last seen at the Mirador San Miguel.
